description: Notes attached to the referral record.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the referral record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the note record.

columns.name: NOTE_DATETIME
columns.description: The instant of creation of the note.
